recipe.title: Lemony Potato Salad
instructions: Cover potatoes with water in a large pot and season well with salt. Bring to a boil, then simmer until tender, 12 to 20 minutes. While potatoes cook, stir together celery, mayonnaise, chives, lemon zest and juice, sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, and 3/4 teaspoon pepper in a large bowl. Drain potatoes and cool completely, then halve or quarter. Add to dressing and toss to coat.
